name: Black Desert - Drieghan Companion Pack
description:
DLC Exclusive: Black Desert Drieghan Update Open-World MMORPG Black Desert has expanded! Embark on an adventure you have been truly longing for.

Drieghan Companion Pack contains the following items: - Newborn Crimson Dragon (DLC Exclusive*) - Young Golden Dragon - Haetae - [Event] Blessing of Kamasylve (7 Days) - [Event] Secret Book of Old Moon (7 Days)

* Newborn Crimson Dragon is limited for DLC packs.

Note: Items in the package will be sent to the server of the region in which you purchased the package. Available for purchase until June 19, 07:00 UTC
